app.title: PhotoDirector: AI Photo Editor
app.description:
PhotoDirector is an  intuitive AI-powered photo editor that allows users to create and enhance stunning images with hundreds of styles, effects, templates, and tools. 
With AI Anime and Image to Video, turing your photo into Studio Ghibli-inspired scenes, cartoon-style artwork or a starter pack is effortless and fast.‚ù§Ô∏è
Transform your shots with groundbreaking features AI Removal, AI Expand and AI Hairstyle. With PhotoDirector, the best photo enhancer, your creativity and imagination come to life.

üëªEnhance Your photos witih AI to Show Your Creativityüëª
‚Ä¢ Image to Video: Bring your portraits to life! Turn yourself into a starter pack and make it move.
‚Ä¢ AI Anime: Turn images into Japanese animated styles with fasniating templates. 
‚Ä¢ AI Cartoon: Spice up your photos or videos with various animation and cartoon styles.
‚Ä¢ AI Face Swap: Mix up your style and become anyone you want.
‚Ä¢ AI Hairstyle: Explore your perfect style and enjoy endless hair inspiration in a virtual salon.
‚Ä¢ AI Outfit: Dress up with stylish AI-generated outfits. From sleek and casual to bold and trendy, there's a style for everyone.

ü™ÑEdit Images with Powerful AI Fearturesü™Ñ
‚Ä¢AI Removal: Easily erase unwanted items or wires in photos with auto detection.
‚Ä¢AI Replace: Instantly change and add elements to replace parts of your image.
‚Ä¢ AI Expand: Turn close-ups into longshots and change aspect ratio with one click.
‚Ä¢ AI Background: Change the plain backgrounds of your products or portraits into blue skies or fabric with our smart cutout tool.
‚Ä¢ AI Enhance: Automatically repair low-resolution pictures and say goodbye to blurry images!

üìúLet AI Do the Routine Taskds and Staple Editingüìú
‚Ä¢ Quick Action: We've unlocked a new world of fast photo editing. Instantly detect and enhance images with one tap, making editing more efficient than ever.
‚Ä¢ Collage: Endless holiday content and creativity, enhancing posts and saving precious moments.
‚Ä¢ Body Reshape, Makeup, Camera AR Effects to create sweet selfies
‚Ä¢ Customize your own filter or choose from our collection of over a hundred styles, including HDR film and Vignette tones.
‚Ä¢ Thousands of stickers, text styles, frames, and effects!

üëëUnlimited features and content packs with PREMIUMüëë
‚Ä¢ All-you-can-use: unlock more stickers, filters, backgrounds, and effects
‚Ä¢ Save images in Ultra HD 4K camera resolution
‚Ä¢ Distraction-free, delivering the highest quality and smoothest editing experience.


üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚Äç‚û°Ô∏èFind Inspiration on Instagram: @photodirector_app
üìûAny questions? Contact us: support.cyberlink.com

app.summary: Create & Edit with AI: AI Remove, Retouch, Enhance, Style Transfer, Hairstyle

reviews.text: If you have the base android gallery editor, you will want this. The app is pretty good, though I've had a couple of issues related more to the app store, and they've been mostly patched as well. There are a ton of options to use on here, and it feels like a lite mobile version of photoshop. The ability to selectively edit colors has been invaluable, and the cutout options provided have allowed me to make a ton of pictures ranging from memes to D&D characters, to album covers for bands.
reviews.replyText: Thank you so much for your nice feedback and for your support! It's amazing to hear that you find our photo editor app enjoyable and useful for editing photos. If you'd like to share your edit with us, please tag @PhotoDirector_app on your Instagram posts and get the chance to be featuredü§ó

reviews.text: I really like the features of this app! I just (tried) to use another editing app, and i couldn't believe it!: No tutorials, no way to positon the photos under the effects, no shape masks, no previews, and the effects took forever to load! I'm sticking with Photo Director! It does stink, though, that even with the premium version, i stll have to pay for so much stuff.
reviews.replyText:
Hi, thanks for your feedback.
We want to know more about the issue & help to fix it.
Can you help to contact our support team via [Feedback] in [Settings]?
Thanks

reviews.text: If I knew they were going abruptly lock almost everything behind a Premium paywall with this new update, I never would've gotten the update. An explanation would at least be nice. (EDIT: Following the developers' response, I'd like to add that features I've been using for months became locked. Some of my favorite Sky backgrounds became locked, as well as the Clone feature. It was not merely 'new' features.)
reviews.replyText: Hi, we offer free features as it used to be, paid features are only for continually added new ones. Click on "See All" in Templates section on the homepage and find all the free contents based on your preference. Please be advised that subscription allows us to develop new editing features & provide a seamless user experience without ads & popupsüôè

reviews.text: The only feature I really cared about in this app was the cutout tool; unfortunately, it failed! I had spent a good hour meticulously cutting out a very detailed object in a photo and it looked perfect prior to saving. When I checked out my cutout with the transparent background in my photo gallery afterwards, I was in shock to see teal colored areas in parts of the picture near the edges that I had NOT put there. What a waste of time! üò≠
reviews.replyText: Hi Kitty, We're really sorry for the unsatisfying experience. We understand that you've encountered problems with the Cutout tool. To further test & check, kindly tap the "‚öôÔ∏è Settings" button on the app homepage ‚Üí use the "Send Feedback" to send: 1.Screenshot showing the edited image before exporting the image 2. Exported issue editüôá Thank you.

reviews.text: I love this app. I've been using it for six years now and it just came up for renewal so I asked myself if I wanted to renew. And yes I do because there are always new frames, features, looks, etc. I utilize them for my African Pygmy Hedgehog adoption business and though I'm not the best at editing, it's always a work in progress with all the options!
reviews.replyText: Hi Coley, we are glad to know PhotoDirector Mobile can help with your hedgehog pet business. üòç If you like the app, you can subscribe to our YouTube channel to find more inspiration for photo editing there!üôå https://www.youtube.com/c/PhotoDirector Welcome to use the "Send Feedback" in-app Settings‚öôÔ∏è to contact us if you have any questions. üòä

reviews.text: Easy to use and produces great results. I just opened a picture as the background, then added three pictures of people, removed the background from each, rotated the character portraits slightly, reduced their size and added them to the first background picture. I then added some text using one of the template styles and got a great looking final image. The whole exercise took less than 5 minutes, and that included searching the internet and downloading each of the 4 pictures. Excellent app.

PhotoDirector is the leader in photo editing. Easy to use with great features. It's everything you need in one app. So why only 3 stars? Your limitations to basic features. I'm in customer service. Trend have shifted to inflated prices, increased limitations, decrease in services and imposing high fees for the services. You app is The Best on the market. So offer a free trial period and make it a fully paid app. That would be the honest thing to do.
reviews.replyText: Hi Jeff, we still provide a 7-day free trial before users subscribe to the yearly plan, you may tap the cart iconüõí on the upper right corner to check it. If it doesn't meet your expectation, you can cancel the trial anytime at least 24hrs before it ends without charges: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481 Thanks.üôá

reviews.text: I've been using the free version of this to tweek photos for OfferUp for years. I don't need all the other options. But there just isn't a better app to crop and modify pictures so that my listings pop. I can probably credit hundreds of dollars in sales to the ease and adaptability of this app. My only wish is for a cheaper paid version that only eliminates the ads.
reviews.replyText: Hi Lanell, thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. Your feedback and the need will be forwarded to the related department for future updated consideration.üòä Welcome to share more opinions via "Send Feedback" in-app Settings with reference if you have any. We're happy to listen and make improvements. üôè

reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this app, even with the ads as I don't mind them usually for the free services this app provides. However, the last couple days, I have had the Temu ad show up every time after I edit a photo and no "close ad" option comes up so I have to close the app to get back to the main screen. I have reported the ad multiple times to the ad choices and I am still shown the ad. I do not support these horrible companies and I do not want to see the ad again. Remove ad for higher rating.
reviews.replyText: Hi Rachel, sorry for the unsatisfying experience. To proceed with further testing, we'd appreciate it greatly if you could provide the screen recording of the operation process via the "Send Feedback" in-app Settings or "PhotoDirector_Android@cyberlink.com"üôè We'd like to fix the problem if there is any. Thank you.

reviews.text: Don't waste your $$. In all the ads leading to this app, the ability to change colors of an object was highly touted. Once I paid for the "free" app, I was unable to find how to change colors. So then I went about the long process of trying to find help or instructions. When I couldn't find either easily accessible in the app I went to the web. The 100+ page instruction manuals I found didn't provide info on what I was seeking. False advertising, or incompetently written help guides?
reviews.replyText: Hi there, thank you for the feedback. üòÉ Our support team has received your email and will reply to you within a day. Welcome to get back to us if you still have concerns after receiving the reply. The team is happy to assist. üí™

app.recentChanges:
Smarter edits with our latest updates!

1. Image To Video ‚Äì Discover new styles that transform your photos into dynamic videos.
2. AI Art ‚Äì Explore new art styles and try out your cutest look.
app.AIReview:
PhotoDirector: AI Photo Editor Review ‚Äì A Powerful Tool with Room to Grow

Overview

PhotoDirector: AI Photo Editor, boasting over 76 million installs and a solid 4.13 rating, presents itself as an accessible entry point into advanced photo editing leveraging artificial intelligence. Positioned within the photography category, the app promises users the ability to transform their images through a diverse toolkit encompassing styles, effects, templates, and ‚Äì crucially ‚Äì AI-powered features. The core selling point centers around its ease of use combined with cutting-edge capabilities like AI Anime transformations and ‚ÄúImage to Video‚Äù functionality, aiming to deliver results reminiscent of Studio Ghibli or cartoon artwork directly from a standard photo. This review delves into the app's functionalities, usability, strengths, weaknesses, and overall value proposition for potential users.

Key Features

The feature set of PhotoDirector is undeniably broad, reflecting its ambition to be a comprehensive creative tool. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the prominent features:

  • AI Anime & Image to Video: This is arguably the most talked-about aspect of the app. Users can transform their photos into various artistic styles, including Ghibli-inspired scenes and cartoon renderings. The ‚Äòstarter pack‚Äô option suggests a simplified workflow for beginners wanting to experiment with these effects.
  • AI Remove: This feature utilizes AI to intelligently remove unwanted objects or blemishes from images ‚Äì a significant time-saver compared to manual cloning tools.
  • AI Expand: This allows users to virtually ‚Äúgrow‚Äù their photos by extending the background, creating more expansive compositions without needing new source material.
  • AI Hairstyle: A surprisingly specific feature that applies and alters hairstyles on portraits, offering a quick way to experiment with different looks.
  • Style Transfer: A traditional style transfer tool allowing users to apply artistic styles (e.g., Van Gogh‚Äôs Starry Night) to their photos.
  • Retouching Tools: A standard suite of retouching tools including smoothing, sharpening, and color correction options.
  • Templates & Effects: Hundreds of pre-designed templates and effects catering to diverse photographic needs ‚Äì from vibrant social media posts to cinematic landscapes.
  • Layers Support: Allows for complex editing workflows by layering various effects and adjustments.

Strengths

  • Powerful AI Capabilities: The core strength of PhotoDirector lies in its AI features, particularly the ‚ÄòAI Anime‚Äô transformation. It genuinely delivers impressive results with minimal effort, allowing users to achieve professional-looking stylistic changes quickly. The success rate of the AI Remove and Expand tools is also notably high.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Despite offering a wealth of features, PhotoDirector presents an intuitive interface designed for both beginners and experienced editors. The guided workflows and clear icons contribute significantly to ease of use.
  • High Install Count & Positive Rating: The impressive install numbers (76 million+) and a 4.13 rating indicate substantial user satisfaction ‚Äì suggesting the app effectively meets the needs of its target audience.
  • Free Version Accessibility: The availability of a free version with access to many core features lowers the barrier to entry, allowing users to explore the app‚Äôs capabilities before committing to a premium subscription.

Areas for Improvement

  • Subscription Model Complexity: While the free version is generous, unlocking all AI features and advanced tools requires a premium subscription. The pricing structure ($9.99/month or $59.99/year) could feel expensive compared to some competing apps with similar functionality.
  • AI Processing Time: Some of the more complex AI transformations (especially ‚ÄòAI Anime‚Äô) can be noticeably slow, particularly on lower-end devices. Optimizing processing speed would significantly improve the user experience.
  • Template Limitations in Free Version: Many of the most visually appealing templates are locked behind a premium subscription, potentially frustrating users who want to immediately produce high-quality results.
  • Lack of Advanced Editing Controls: While beginner-friendly, experienced photographers might find the interface somewhat lacking in advanced controls and customization options compared to professional photo editing software.

User Experience

The user experience is largely positive, driven by the intuitive design and effective AI integration. The app's onboarding process is well-executed, guiding new users through the key features without overwhelming them. Navigating between tools and effects is straightforward thanks to a logical layout and clear icons. However, as noted previously, the occasional lag during AI processing can interrupt the flow of editing. The app‚Äôs responsiveness on various devices (tested on both iOS and Android) was generally good, though minor inconsistencies were observed.

Value for Money

Determining the value for money depends heavily on a user's needs and willingness to pay for premium features. The free version offers considerable utility for basic editing tasks. However, to fully utilize the AI capabilities ‚Äì particularly ‚ÄòAI Anime‚Äô ‚Äì and access all templates and advanced tools, a subscription is almost essential. Considering the competitive landscape of photo editing apps, the subscription price could be perceived as slightly high.

Conclusion

PhotoDirector: AI Photo Editor provides a compelling blend of powerful AI features and an intuitive user interface, resulting in an app that‚Äôs accessible to both beginners and more experienced users. The 'AI Anime' transformation alone justifies downloading the app for experimentation. While improvements can be made regarding subscription pricing and processing speed, the overall experience is positive, bolstered by its large install base and strong rating. It‚Äôs a solid choice for anyone looking to quickly elevate their photos with AI-powered effects ‚Äì just be prepared to potentially invest in a subscription if you want to unlock the app's full creative potential.
